Chapter 2 Mendiani 2.1 Location Guinea 2.2 Ethnic group Malinke 2.3 Purpose Mendiani is an initiated dance for young girls between the ages of 8 and 12 who must be virgins. After Ramadan, they are carried out to the village bara on the shoulders of men, then they dance. 2.4 Notation
